text: Juan Bautista Cascini (born 4 June 1997) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Academica Clinceni. ==Career== After eleven years in the club's youth system from 2005, Cascini was promoted into the first-team of Argentine Primera División side Estudiantes in 2016. He was an unused substitute four times during 2016, before making his professional debut in 2016–17 on 28 August 2016 in an away win to Tigre. In his third league appearance, on 7 April 2017, he scored his first senior goal in a 1–4 victory versus Aldosivi. APOEL of the Cypriot First Division loaned Cascini in August 2018. ==Personal life== Bautista is the son of former footballer Raúl Alfredo Cascini. ==Career statistics== . {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |+ Club statistics |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="5"|Estudiantes |2016 |rowspan="4"|Primera División |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- |2016–17 |11||1||1||0||colspan="2"|—||4Appearance(s) in the Copa Libertadores||0||0||0||16||1 |- |2017–18 |7||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||3Appearance(s) in the Copa Sudamericana||0||0||0||10||0 |- |2018–19 |0||0||0||0||0||0||2||0||0||0||2||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !18!!1!!1!!0!!0!!0!!9!!0!!0!!0!!28!!1 |- |rowspan="1"|APOEL (loan) |2018–19 |rowspan="1"|First Division |2||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||1Appearance(s) in the Cypriot Super Cup||0||4||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !20!!1!!2!!0!!0!!0!!9!!0!!1!!0!!32!!1 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from La Plata Category:Argentine footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Argentine expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Cyprus Category:Argentine expatriate sportspeople in Cyprus Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania Category:Argentine expatriate sportspeople in Romania Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Liga I players Category:Estudiantes de La Plata footballers Category:APOEL FC players Category:FC Botoșani players Category:FC Academica Clinceni players
